pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flask-Useful============|PyPI| |LICENCE| |STARS||DOWNLOADS| |DOWNLOADS_M| |DOWNLOADS_W|**Flask-Useful** - A set of useful tools for the Flask microframework.Installation------------Install the latest stable version by running the command:: pip install Flask-UsefulAlembic-------Update alembic's ``env.py`` to register a operation plugins:.. code-block:: python # migrations/env.py import flask_useful.alembic.. |PyPI| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/flask-useful.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/flask-useful/ :alt: Latest Version.. |LICENCE| image:: https://img.shields.io/github/license/kyzima-spb/flask-useful.svg :target: https://github.com/kyzima-spb/flask-useful/blob/master/LICENSE :alt: MIT.. |STARS| image:: https://img.shields.io/github/stars/kyzima-spb/flask-useful.svg :target: https://github.com/kyzima-spb/flask-useful/stargazers :alt: GitHub stars.. |DOWNLOADS| image:: https://pepy.tech/badge/flask-useful :target: https://pepy.tech/project/flask-useful.. |DOWNLOADS_M| image:: https://pepy.tech/badge/flask-useful/month :target: https://pepy.tech/project/flask-useful.. |DOWNLOADS_W| image:: https://pepy.tech/badge/flask-useful/week :target: https://pepy.tech/project/flask-useful
